name: Moorhuhn: Director's Cut (itch)
description:
The number 1 classic among the Moorhuhn shooters brings lots of shooting fun with lots of chickens and just as many puzzles. Whether with mouse, touch or controller, the boredom is over from now on!

You got plenty of ammo to hunt as many chickens and collect as many points as possible. Beat your personal record and compete with players around the world.

Every new record you achieve is entered into the online ranking list when you are connected to the internet.

We assure you that no animals were harmed in the production of this game and would like to ask all animal rights activists not to bore us with far-fetched theories.

All rights go to ak tronic
